HOME.TITLE: Liquors of the World
HOME.WELCOME_TEXT: Get ready to showcase your mastery of the world's spirits in an epic quiz, where only the savviest liquor aficionados will manage to claim victory...

START_QUIZ.TITLE: Start
START_QUIZ.TEXT: Are you ready to start the quiz? New players won't be able to join afterwards!

LOADING.PLEASE_WAIT: Hello {{username}}! Please wait for quiz to start...

ANSWER.WAIT_FOR_PLAYERS: Please wait for all players to answer the question...
